name: Magento
description: Connect your Magento 2 e-commerce store to manage products, orders, customers, inventory, and analyze sales performance through Magento's REST API
author: Hay

magentoBaseUrl.description: The base URL of your Magento 2 REST API endpoint (e.g., https://your-store.com/rest/V1)
magentoBaseUrl.label: Magento Base URL

magentoApiToken.description: Magento 2 Admin API access token. Generate this from your Magento admin panel under System > Extensions > Integrations.
magentoApiToken.label: Magento API Token
magentoApiToken.placeholder: Bearer token from Magento admin integration
